mapper.update: update insurance set vid = #{vid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, insuretime = #{insuretime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, lefttime = #{lefttime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, frontimg = #{frontimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, afterimg = #{afterimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, recordimg = #{recordimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cerimg = #{cerimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, labelimg = #{labelimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where insid = #{insid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select insid, vid, insuretime, lefttime, frontimg, afterimg, recordimg, cerimg, labelimg from insurance
mapper.update: update insurance set insuretime = #{insuretime}, lefttime = #{lefttime}, frontimg = #{frontimg}, afterimg = #{afterimg}, recordimg = #{recordimg}, cerimg = #{cerimg}, labelimg = #{labelimg} where vid = #{vid}
